customsInvoice.title: Customs Invoice
customsInvoice.ProductDescription: Product Description (be specific of contents for customs)
customsInvoice.WhatIsReason: What is the reason for the export
customsInvoice.Iconfirm: I confirm I have read and understood the both Terms & Conditions.

payment.note: DHL prices can change every 10 minutes. Finish your payment to secure your rate.
payment.KindlyAttach: Kindly attach the first label on the shipment
payment.andRetain: and retain the second label for your records

shipment.envelope_1: Insert your document inside the envelope
shipment.envelope_2: Remove the seal to protect your documents
shipment.envelope_3: Place Shipping Label Inside Shipping Pouch
shipment.envelope_4: Remove pouch seal and place pouch on envelope
shipment.envelope_5: Stick the pouch on the envelope
shipment.envelope_6: Give the envelope to the clerk
shipment.package_1: Insert your goods inside the package
shipment.package_2: Remove the sticky seal to secure your goods
shipment.package_3: Place Shipping Label Inside Shipping Pouch
shipment.package_4: Remove the sticky seal to secure the shipping label
shipment.package_5: Stick the pouch on the package
shipment.package_6: Give the package to the clerk

Dropoff.EntrerTheLast: Enter the last barcode on the shipment label
Dropoff.ScanTheLast: Scan the last barcode on the shipment label
Dropoff.EnterThePiece: Enter the piece ID starting after '(J)'
Dropoff.WeDont: We don't profit from drop-offs, your review on Google helps us grow. Scan the QR code to make a review
Dropoff.PleaseGive: Please give your package or envelope to the clerk
